description: Large left and right parentheses surrounding an upward-pointing bird with no wings

features.description: Are the cage parenthesis round? 0 = round, 1 = angular, 2 = indeterminate
What shape is the bird's head? 0 = triangle, 1 = simple stroke, 2 = curved line
How is the body decorated? 0 = empty, 1 = hatching
What shape is the bird's body? 0 = fat bulge, 1 = delicate oval, 2 = triangular
